name: Electronics
description: This category includes a wide range of electronic devices and accessories such as smartphones, laptops, cameras, headphones, and other gadgets

name: Clothing and Apparel
description: This category encompasses all types of clothing items, including shirts, dresses, pants, shoes, accessories, and more, catering to various styles and preferences

name: Home and Furniture
description: This category features products for home improvement, decoration, and furnishing, including items like sofas, beds, tables, kitchenware, and decor pieces

name: Beauty and Personal Care
description: Products in this category focus on cosmetics, skincare, haircare, fragrances, grooming tools, and other items related to personal hygiene and appearance

name: Books
description: This category offers a wide selection of books, e-books

name: Toys
description: This category offers a wide selection of toys
